I took a look at the hive-exec jar and found that the Avro core jar was not included, though avro-mapred is included.

I confirmed that Avro core was included in the Hive 0.12 hive-exec jar. Was there a reason why this was removed in trunk? It seems that this would break the AvroSerDe.
